Action.author: narendranathreddy
Action.body: Its resolved, Error due to multiple versions of genesis blocks

Action.author: kopaygorodsky
Action.body: ~narendranathreddy I've just got the same error and trying to debug it. What did you mean with multiple versions of genesis block? I had my network up and running, then on an orderer, I needed to resize my disk due to low space and after a restart, all files are in there, but orderer throws this error for some channel. Other channels were restored just fine.
